an6.29:4.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ āmantesi:
an6.29:4.3: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā udāyī tuṇhī ahosi.
an6.29:4.4: Dutiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ āmantesi:
an6.29:4.6: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā udāyī tuṇhī ahosi.
an6.29:4.7: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ āmantesi:
an6.29:4.9: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā udāyī tuṇhī ahosi.
an6.29:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando āyasmantaṃ udāyiṃ etadavoca:
an6.29:5.4: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati—
an6.29:5.7: Iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
an6.29:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesi:
an6.29:7.3: Idha, bhante, bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi … pe …
an6.29:7.5: Idaṃ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ evaṃ bahulīkataṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṃvattati. (1)
an6.29:8.1: “Puna caparaṃ, bhante, bhikkhu ālokasaññaṃ manasi karoti, divā saññaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā;
an6.29:8.2: iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
an6.29:8.3: Idaṃ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ evaṃ bahulīkataṃ ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṃvattati. (2)
an6.29:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhante, bhikkhu imameva kāyaṃ uddhaṃ pādatalā adho kesamatthakā tacapariyantaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati:
an6.29:9.2: ‘atthi imasmiṃ kāye kesā lomā nakhā dantā taco, maṃsaṃ nhāru aṭṭhi aṭṭhimiñjaṃ vakkaṃ, hadayaṃ yakanaṃ kilomakaṃ pihakaṃ papphāsaṃ, antaṃ antaguṇaṃ udariyaṃ karīsaṃ, pittaṃ semhaṃ pubbo lohitaṃ sedo medo, assu vasā kheḷo siṅghāṇikā lasikā muttan’ti.
an6.29:9.3: Idaṃ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ evaṃ bahulīkataṃ kāmarāgappahānāya saṃvattati. (3)
an6.29:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhante, bhikkhu seyyathāpi passeyya sarīraṃ sivathikāya chaṭṭitaṃ ekāhamataṃ vā dvīhamataṃ vā tīhamataṃ vā uddhumātakaṃ vinīlakaṃ vipubbakajātaṃ.
an6.29:10.2: So imameva kāyaṃ evaṃ upasaṃharati:
an6.29:10.3: ‘ayampi kho kāyo evaṃdhammo evaṃbhāvī evaṃanatīto’ti. (4)
an6.29:11.1: Seyyathāpi vā pana passeyya sarīraṃ sīvathikāya chaṭṭitaṃ kākehi vā khajjamānaṃ kulalehi vā khajjamānaṃ gijjhehi vā khajjamānaṃ sunakhehi vā khajjamānaṃ siṅgālehi vā khajjamānaṃ vividhehi vā pāṇakajātehi khajjamānaṃ.
an6.29:12.1: Seyyathāpi vā pana passeyya sarīraṃ sīvathikāya chaṭṭitaṃ aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ samaṃsalohitaṃ nhārusambandhaṃ … pe …
an6.29:12.4: Aṭṭhikāni apagatasambandhāni disāvidisāvikkhittāni, aññena hatthaṭṭhikaṃ aññena pādaṭṭhikaṃ aññena jaṅghaṭṭhikaṃ aññena ūruṭṭhikaṃ aññena kaṭiṭṭhikaṃ aññena phāsukaṭṭhikaṃ aññena piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhikaṃ aññena khandhaṭṭhikaṃ aññena gīvaṭṭhikaṃ aññena hanukaṭṭhikaṃ aññena dantakaṭṭhikaṃ aññena sīsakaṭāhaṃ, aṭṭhikāni setāni saṅkhavaṇṇappaṭibhāgāni aṭṭhikāni puñjakitāni terovassikāni aṭṭhikāni pūtīni cuṇṇakajātāni.
an6.29:12.7: Idaṃ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ evaṃ bahulīkataṃ asmimānasamugghātāya saṃvattati.
an6.29:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhante, bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā … pe …
an6.29:13.3: Idaṃ, bhante, anussatiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ evaṃ bahulīkataṃ anekadhātupaṭivedhāya saṃvattati.
an6.29:13.4: Imāni kho, bhante, pañca anussatiṭṭhānānī”ti. (5)
an6.29:14.2: Tena hi tvaṃ, ānanda, idampi chaṭṭhaṃ anussatiṭṭhānaṃ dhārehi.
an6.29:14.3: Idhānanda, bhikkhu satova abhikkamati satova paṭikkamati satova tiṭṭhati satova nisīdati satova seyyaṃ kappeti satova kammaṃ adhiṭṭhāti.
an6.29:14.4: Idaṃ, ānanda, anussatiṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ evaṃ bahulīkataṃ satisampajaññāya saṃvattatī”ti. (6)
